resources.string: Pure Link Monitor for clipboard cleaning
To clean links automatically in the background (e.g., from WhatsApp), Pure Link needs the Accessibility Service enabled.

This service monitors your clipboard content to automatically detect, unshorten, and remove tracking parameters, ads, and malicious add-ons from copied links without needing to open the app. This feature runs silently in the background and is compatible with all applications.

Privacy Notice: Internet access is required solely to resolve shortened URLs to their original destination. Pure Link does not record, store, or share your personal data or clipboard content with any third parties.

Note: Enabling this service is optional. If you prefer not to use it, you can manually paste links into the Pure Link app for cleaning.
